description.value:
Some ijtikris never grow out of their juvenile stage’s water adaptations, which on Vesk-2 is seen as a fine alternative to being fully adapted to land. Such an ijtikri has the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.universal-creature-rules.Item.tqRguTXDUmQGu8Xp]{Amphibious} trait and the aquatic subtype, as well as a swim speed of 40 feet. The ijtikri also has a better sense of their body in three-dimensional space, and when they are @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.QnGpBSHSTiszjPSb]{Off-Kilter}, they don’t take the normal penalties to attacks and don’t gain the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.MZ8OoH1GE9qDMyCD]{Flat-footed} condition.

This replaces ijtikri movement.
